entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: MEGA MAN X DiVE Offline
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫629,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫61,99 [‚Ç∫61,99 ~ ‚Ç∫629,00]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫61,99

Application Description

‚ñ†‚ñ† Caution ‚ñ†‚ñ† Please check the "Regarding Purchases" and "Supported Devices" notices below before purchasing or using the app. --- Game Introduction --- Mega Man X DiVE reimagined the world of the Mega Man X series, and now it's getting an offline version! Experience the exciting side-scrolling action we've all come to know and love in a whole new light! Enter Deep Log, a digital world where the game data of the Mega Man X series has been archived. Due to a bug of unknown origins, the game data within Deep Log has become fragmented. With the help of a mysterious navigator, RiCO, the player dives into this digital world to set things straight. Take control of Hunter Programs, recreations of legendary characters such as X and Zero, defeat various forms of Irregular Data, and restore the fractured game data! - Classic Mega Man Action Jump, dash, fire your buster, and swing your saber. All the actions you'd expect from the Mega Man X series are here! In addition, this game features 360 degree aiming and an auto-lock function! You can also scale and position the touchscreen controls to match your own unique playstyle. - Featuring over 100 Characters from the Mega Man Series Acquire your favorite characters from across the Mega Man universe to add to your collection, and level them up to make them stronger! With a mix of brand-new original characters and new designs for fan-favorites, there are plenty out there to discover! - An All-New Original Story with Hundreds of Stages to Enjoy Immerse yourself in a new Mega Man tale that can only be experienced in Mega Man X DiVE. Blast and cut your way through hundreds of stages spanning multiple difficulty levels! - Make Your Characters Stronger with Weapons, Chips, and Cards Characters can equip all types of weapons to become stronger. Upgrade a weapon's rank to increase its power and unlock new skills. Cards featuring classic illustrations also provide boosts, making them fun items to collect as you craft your perfect Hunter Program! „ÄêRegarding Purchases„Äë Regardless of the reason, we cannot offer refunds (or an exchange for another product or service) once the app is purchased. „ÄêSupported Devices„Äë Please check the following URL for a list of operating environments (devices/OSs) supported by this app. https://www.capcom-games.com/megaman/xdive-offline/en-us/ Note: Although you can purchase this app using devices and OSs not listed as supported, the app may not function properly. Please be aware that we can neither guarantee the app's performance nor offer refunds if you use a device or OS not supported by the app. „ÄêEnjoy More Capcom Titles!„Äë Search for "Capcom" in the App Store, or the name of one of our apps, for more fun games to play!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Ace Attorney Trilogy
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫599,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫299,99 [‚Ç∫299,99 ~ ‚Ç∫599,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫299,99

Application Description

‚ñ†‚ñ† Caution ‚ñ†‚ñ† Please check the "Regarding Purchases" and "Supported Devices" notices below before purchasing or using the app. --- Game Introduction --- Become a lawyer and take the stand to prove your client‚Äôs innocence in a court of law! Enjoy rookie attorney Phoenix Wright's first three games in the popular series, all in one package! All 14 thrilling episodes of Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney, Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney ‚Äì Justice for All, and Phoenix Wright: Ace Attorney ‚Äì Trials and Tribulations are included!F6 With high-resolution graphics, courtroom battles never looked this beautiful! On top of Japanese and English, you can experience the world of Ace Attorney in French, German, Chinese (simplified and traditional), and Korean as well! Just swap to your preferred language in the Options menu! The number of save slots has increased to ten! There are now ten save slots per language available across all three games! „ÄêGame Overview„Äë There's been a murder! Uncover the truth to save your innocent client! - Investigation Gather information and evidence related to the case! - Courtroom Outwit cunning prosecutors and call out witnesses to discover what really happened by finding inconsistencies in their statements! Solve the intriguing mysteries behind each case and witness the final truth for yourself! Note: During normal conversation, you can fast-forward the dialogue by holding the text skip button. Note: This collection is the same as the one previously released on home gaming platforms. „ÄêRegarding Purchases„Äë Regardless of the reason, we cannot offer refunds (or an exchange for another product or service) once the app is purchased. „ÄêSupported Devices„Äë Please check the following URL for a list of operating environments (devices/OSs) supported by this app. https://www.capcom-games.com/product/en-us/aceattorney-trilogy-app/?t=openv Note: Although you can purchase this app using devices and OSs not listed as supported, the app may not function properly. Please be aware that we can neither guarantee the app's performance nor offer refunds if you use a device or OS not supported by the app. „ÄêEnjoy More Capcom Titles!„Äë Search for "Capcom" in the App Store, or the name of one of our apps, for more fun games to play!

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Street Fighter IV CE
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫109,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫19,99 [‚Ç∫19,99 ~ ‚Ç∫109,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫19,99

Application Description

A new warrior has entered the ring! Take control of 32 world warriors and test your mettle against players from around the world. Street Fighter IV: Champion Edition perfects the winning gameplay formula by offering higher resolution graphics, three new characters (Rose, Juri and Elena) wide screen support for newer iOS devices and a host of updates and refinements. Long time Street Fighter fans can jump into the action and have an instant familiarity with the controls. For more casual players Street Fighter IV features numerous settings and tutorials that put you on the path to victory. ‚Ä¢ Fight as 32 Street Fighter characters ‚Ä¢ Higher resolution graphics and wide screen support ‚Ä¢ Intuitive virtual pad controls allow players to execute full move sets including Unique Attacks, Special Moves, Focus Attacks, Super Combos and Ultra Combos ‚Ä¢ Take your game to the next level with a MFi controller like the Gamevice (MFi controllers do not work in menus, they fully function in multiplayer and single-player gameplay.) ‚Ä¢ Battle head-to-head against players from around the world via Wifi ‚Ä¢ Single player ‚Äúarcade‚Äù and multiplayer modes. ‚Ä¢ Unleash super moves with a tap of the ‚ÄúSP‚Äù button. ‚Ä¢ Four levels of difficulty. Please check [Supported OS and Devices] in the lower part of HP. https://www.capcom-games.com/product/en-us/streetfighter4-championedition/?t=openv

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Northgard
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫249,99 [‚Ç∫249,99 ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫249,99

In-App Purchases

  • Scale BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Clan of the DragonÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Fur BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Clan of the HorseÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Clan of the snakeÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Clan of the LynxÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Winter BundleÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • Clan of the EagleÔºö‚Ç∫99,99
  • Clan of the KrakenÔºö‚Ç∫129,99
  • Clan of the OxÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Northgard is a strategy game based on Norse mythology in which you control a Clan of Vikings fighting for the control of a mysterious newfound continent. After years of tireless explorations, brave Vikings have discovered a new land filled with mystery, danger and riches: NORTHGARD. The boldest Northmen have set sail to explore and conquer these new shores, bring fame to their Clan and write history through conquest, trading, or devotion to the Gods. That is, if they can survive the dire Wolves and Undead Warriors roaming the land, befriend or defeat the giants, and survive the harshest winters ever witnessed in the North. FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Build your settlement on the newly discovered continent of Northgard ‚Ä¢ Assign your vikings to various jobs (Farmer, Warrior, Sailor, Loremaster...) ‚Ä¢ Manage your resources carefully and survive harsh winters and vicious foes ‚Ä¢ Expand and discover new territory with unique strategic opportunities ‚Ä¢ Achieve different victory conditions (Conquest, Fame, Lore, Trading...) STORY MODE: RIG‚ÄôS SAGA The Viking High King is murdered and his Regal Horn is stolen by a man named Hagen. This event kickstarts a saga that will take Rig, his son and heir accompanied by his right-hand man Brand through the new continent of Northgard. The continent where he will make new friends and foes and discover a much greater threat than Hagen, and the reasons behind his father‚Äôs assassination. MULTIPLAYER ‚Ä¢ Play with or against other Mobile players with up to 6 players ‚Ä¢ Includes Duel, Free for All and Teamplay modes CHOOSE YOUR CLAN In order to complete the 11 campaign chapters, the player will have to master the specificities of the 6 first clans and tame the unforgiving wilderness of Northgard. More clans are joining the fight for Northgard! ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Snake: Act from the shadows and take the lead with cunning guerilla tactics ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Dragon: Embrace the old ways and please the gods with sacrifices ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Kraken: Harness the bounty of the sea and unleash its brutal might You can unlock the clans of the Snake, Dragon and Kraken separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Scale Bundle. ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Horse: Devote yourself to the art of blacksmithing and craft powerful Relics ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Ox: Equip ancestral equipment and prove the might of your forefathers ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Lynx: Adopt Nature‚Äôs way and lure mythical preys into ambushes You can unlock the Clans of the Horse, Ox and Lynx separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Fur Bundle. ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Squirrel: Gather ingredients to prepare special recipes and survive the harsh winters ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Rat: Embrace the way of the Shamans and work for the clan ‚Ä¢ Clan of the Eagle: Occupy a large territory, venture outside and gather resources Unlock the clans of the Squirrel, Rat and Eagle separately by buying the DLCs, or together with the Winter Bundle. Carefully redesigned for mobile ‚Ä¢ Revamped interface ‚Ä¢ Game Center achievements ‚Ä¢ iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices If you experience any issue with Northgard, please contact our customer support at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com and give us as much as possible information on your problem.

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Streets of Rage 4
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫99,99 [‚Ç∫99,99 ~ ‚Ç∫349,99]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫99,99

In-App Purchases

  • Mr. X Nightmare DLCÔºö‚Ç∫129,99

Application Description

Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again! Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics. Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards. FEATURES - Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics - Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragon‚Äôs Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX - Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets - Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade... - Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier Derivi√®re and legend Yuzo Koshiro - Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics ! * NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE* - New co-op moves - +300 in-game improvements - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter -MULTIPLAYER UPDATE- - Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together! - Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels" -Mr. X Nightmare DLC- The fight continues in Wood Oak City. After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister X‚Äôs brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. With this DLC, get ready for: ‚Ä¢ 3 new playable characters ‚Ä¢ A new Survival mode with weekly challenges ‚Ä¢ Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves ‚Ä¢ New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release.o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release. CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFicontrollers - No micro-transactions! Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Application Screenshot

iPhone

iPad

entry.title: Resident Evil Village for Mac
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö‚Ç∫1.399,00 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫349,90 [Free ~ ‚Ç∫1.399,00]Ôºâ

All Price Information

PriceÔºö‚Ç∫349,90

In-App Purchases

  • DLC packÔºö‚Ç∫389,00
  • All Access VoucherÔºö‚Ç∫69,99
  • Street Wolf OutfitÔºö‚Ç∫78,99

Application Description

Experience survival horror like never before in the 8th major installment in the Resident Evil franchise - Resident Evil Village. With detailed graphics, intense first-person action and masterful storytelling, the terror has never felt more realistic. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†In-App Purchases ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village (Base Game) „ÉªThe Trauma Pack DLC „ÉªSamurai Edge - AW Model-01 „ÉªResident Evil 7 Found Footage Filter „ÉªResident Evil 7 Tape Recorder Save Point „ÉªSaferoom Music "Go Tell Aunt Rhody" „ÉªMr. Everywhere Weapon Charm „ÉªUnlock "Village of Shadows" Difficulty „ÉªThe Tragedy of Ethan Winters Artwork „ÉªThe Baker Incident Report „ÉªSurvival Resources Pack „ÉªMr. Raccoon Weapon Charm ‚ñ†Winters' Expansion „ÉªExperience brand-new additional content for the award-winning modern horror masterpiece Resident Evil Village: Third Person Mode, The Mercenaries Additional Orders, and Shadows of Rose. „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit „ÉªStreet Wolf Outfit for Rose (applies to Shadow of Rose content only) ‚ñ†Extra Content Shop All Access Vouche ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Please confirm the terms above and agree to this Agreement before purchasing the Program. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†A limited part of the base game can be played for free. In order to play the full game, an in-app purchase is required. ‚ñ†This game can be played without a controller, however we recommend using a controller as the game has been optimized for controller use. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 35GB. Important Note: The installation process requires that you have at least twice the size of the application in free storage space available. We recommend downloading the data in an environment with good connectivity. ‚ñ†Save data upload and download functionality via iCloud Drive has been added. ‚ñ†Save data cannot be uploaded and downloaded between MacOS and iOS devices. ‚ñ†Resident Evil Village does not support Universal Purchase. ‚ñ†Purchase Precautions „ÉªAfter purchase, returns (including exchange for other products/services) will not be provided for any reason. „ÉªIn-app purchases can only be used by the Apple Account that made the purchase and cannot be shared with Family Sharing members. ‚ñ†Compatible OSs and Devices https://www.capcom-games.com/apple/en-us/ ------------------------------------------------------------ RESIDENT EVIL is a trademark and/or registered trademark of CAPCOM CO., LTD. and/or its subsidiaries in the U.S. and/or other countries.

  • Attach√© Case: 'Classic'Ôºö‚Ç∫35,99

Application Description

Survival is just the beginning. Six years have passed since the biological disaster in Raccoon City. Agent Leon S. Kennedy, one of the survivors of the incident, has been sent to rescue the president's kidnapped daughter. He tracks her to a secluded European village, where there is something terribly wrong with the locals. And the curtain rises on this story of daring rescue and grueling horror where life and death, terror and catharsis intersect. Featuring modernized gameplay, a reimagined storyline, and vividly detailed graphics, Resident Evil 4 marks the rebirth of an industry juggernaut. Relive the nightmare that revolutionized survival horror. ------------------------------------------------------------ ‚ñ†By purchasing, you will be granted a license to use the product. ‚ñ†A network connection is required when starting the application. ‚ñ†About the End User License Agreement „ÉªThis End User License Agreement (this ‚ÄúAgreement‚Äù) applies to the user‚Äôs use of this game software program (the ‚ÄúProgram‚Äù). „ÉªTHIS AGREEMENT SHALL COME INTO EFFECT BETWEEN CAPCOM CO., LTD. AND USER(S) UPON INSTALLATION OF THE PROGRAM BY THE USER. „ÉªThose users between the ages of 13 and 18 (or between 13 and the age of legal majority in your country of residence) or a person with limited capacity shall install the Program only after obtaining approval from its parent or legal guardian who agrees to be bound by these provisions of this Agreement. Not all controllers will work as intended. ‚ñ†This application is approximately 30GB. entry.title: MoneyTrack: Expense & Budget
entry.content:
Discount Information

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫899,99 ‚Üí ‚Ç∫800,00 [‚Ç∫800,00 ~ ‚Ç∫899,99]

All Price Information

PriceÔºöFree

In-App Purchases

  • LifetimeÔºö‚Ç∫800,00
  • AnnualÔºö‚Ç∫299,99
  • MonthlyÔºö‚Ç∫59,99

Application Description

MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions. ‚ñ† CORE FEATURES ‚Ä¢ Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions ‚Ä¢ Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management ‚Ä¢ Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues ‚Ä¢ Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments ‚ñ† COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT ‚Ä¢ Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards) ‚Ä¢ Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking ‚Ä¢ Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation) ‚Ä¢ Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates ‚ñ† THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS ‚Ä¢ Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records ‚Ä¢ Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances ‚Ä¢ Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection ‚Ä¢ Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format ‚Ä¢ Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule ‚Ä¢ Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders ‚Ä¢ Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs ‚ñ† CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are. ‚ñ† FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT We do one thing only ‚Äî help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

Application Screenshot

iPad
